replan.subquery: ultra-processed foods health research 2024 2025 recent studies
replan.rationale: Address lack of recent evidence by targeting 2024-2025 publications

replan.rationale: Expand coverage with high-quality systematic reviews and meta-analyses

replan.rationale: Improve evidence quality with RCTs and rigorous clinical studies

expected_gain: Recency score should increase to 3-4 with 2024-2025 sources; Coverage score should increase to 3-4 with diverse systematic reviews; Faithfulness score should increase to 4-5 with higher quality evidence; Balance score should increase to 3-4 with broader perspective coverage; Overall score should improve from 2.5 to approximately 3.5
